title: Stacey Abrams trails Brian Kemp, David Perdue for Georgia governor, new poll shows

author: Barnini Chakraborty
title: Brian Kemp surges ahead of Trump-backed David Perdue in Georgia GOP primary: Poll

sentence: In Georgia, for instance, Trump endorsed former Senator David Perdue in the race for governor, hoping to defeat incumbent Brian Kemp.

title: Primaries in Pennsylvania, elsewhere are a referendum on Trump & Biden
